ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: NOT( LEED_USR_Mod_Innovation_1__c = 0 || LEED_USR_Mod_Innovation_1__c = 1 || LEED_USR_Mod_Innovation_1__c = 2 || LEED_USR_Mod_Innovation_1__c = 3 || LEED_USR_Mod_Innovation_1__c = 4 || LEED_USR_Mod_Innovation_1__c = 5 )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: This field's value is outside of the acceptable range. Please adjust to a value of 0, 1, 2, 3, 4, or 5.
